attributes.action: Encourage the USA to be More Fuel Efficient
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Suggest to the USA that if it could encourage its People to Stop Cruising Long Distances in cars only doing 20mpg and instead Ride Large V twin and Other Fuel Efficient Motercycles at 60+ mpg. Then they could be less dependant on Middle east oil supplies and produce less pollution.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
